price: 13. Nabii Mucammadow ﷺ ama koros koo kee kool oobisnc Qhuraan ma nummassa, nummah koros finqisnam naharsi marih gitay tatrey Yalli ken finqah madqe kinni.
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi waqad khalat sunnatu al-awalīna
